source_app.description: Standardized source application name (aqueduct, unify, lum, etc)

environment.description: Environment (dev, uat, pre-prod, prod, test or others)

timestamp_event.description: Timestamp of the event in epoch milliseconds

country.description: The country the data is related to.

catalog_id.description: Identifier for the data definition (Glue/Hive) database and table name for example

format.description: Format of the data (parquet, delta, crunch, etc).

format_options.description: When possible, add additional options related to the format

additional_info.description: Optional additional fields structured as an inner JSON
